All Implemented Interfaces:
Rotatable, Effectable, Anchorable, Bounded, DragRepositoryAccessor, EventInitiator, GameNode, Placeable, Removable, SceneChild, Initializable, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.DimensionsProvider, TimerListProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
DynamicCircleEntity
public abstract class CircleEntity extends CenteredShapeEntity<javafx.scene.shape.Circle>
A CircleEntity provides the option to use a drawable Circle as an YaegerEntity. As opposed to some shapes (RectangleEntity, for instance), the reference point of a CircleEntity is its center.

For a CircleEntity it is possible to set the radius, through the methods setRadius(double). By default, this value will be set to 1.
